mapper.select: select user_encrypted_password as encryptedPassword, user_address as address, user_phone_number as phoneNumber, user_mobile_carrier as mobileCarrier, user_gender as gender, user_create_date as createDate, user_update_date as updateDate, user_id as id, user_name as name from helf_users where user_id = #{value}
select user_tel as phoneNumber, user_id as id, user_name as name from helf_users where substr(user_tel, 10, 4) = #{value}
